replies.body:
Please refer to the following link, as it seems you don't understand the concept very well

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harassment
If people are flaming, you just mute them and ignore them. Don't talk to them.

riot will ban you for whatever these days. There's a reason the summoner's code is vague- so they don't have to explain it and they can punish people for what they deem necessary.

I mean, I've been flamed for trying to explain to people how to last hit minions instead of standing there AA'ing

chat restricted for responding to a blatant troll (who admitted they were trolling in chat and didn't care if they got banned because they have 3 accounts or whatever) with humorous sarcasm and things like, "you act like i care if you're trolling...that just looks bad on you, not me"

I've been "muted and reported" for saying there's free gold top and asking why no one ever comes to push out the lanes etc.

Your chat though

1) can't cuss, people get banned for NOT even cussing, and the "short keys" don't work, like when people try to say "fk" instead of "fuck" even though there is good context for cussing, but a computer doesn't know that because humans don't reveal your punishments or bans. Can't respond with any kind of hostility or any and everything is all your fault. 

2) the best way to irritate your trollers is to make it humorous. "you're right, i AM a total piece of trash :( i guess that's why you're here playing this game on my team" etc. etc. kill them with kindness "awh, i love you too baby. I love my new nickname, "garbage" it's got a certain...je ne se quois to it" Hell, or just add them after game and go play with them and report them after every game until they get banned, lol. Kind of kidding, i don't even know if that would work.

But yeah, anything and every thing can be your fault apparently these days, no matter how soft or harsh because.....its the league community. You gotta put your kid gloves on and handle with caution.
